New Records: The Blue Jays set a season high for both runs (15) and hits (23)
Key Match Events: Daulton Varsho and Spencer Horwitz each hit two-run home runs in the first inning
Addison Barger hit a two-run blast in the second inning
Will Wagner added a solo homer for Toronto, his second big league homer
Post-Match Reflections: José Berríos said he had a fever, but still pitched six shutout innings
John Schneider mentioned that Berríos was under the weather
Kyle Farmer pitched the eighth and ninth innings and allowed three runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game tied a Blue Jays franchise record for largest shutout win
Second baseman Will Wagner finished the game with five hits, the first rookie in Blue Jays history to do so
Others: Manny Margot exited the game with right groin tightness and will undergo an MRI on Sunday morning
The Twins remain 3 1/2 games behind the first-place Guardians and a game back of the second-place Royals in the American League Central
